body:
Hello Avicus Community,

If you had your own world and you could have three things that you would love to have in it but you can't have the world we live in right now, what would it be? A pony, unicorn or sun forever?

If I had to choose I'd pick:
- Snow forever
- Unlimited lives
- No school
Look forward to seeing some interesting comments.

replies.body:
"Snow forever"

As someone who lives in a country that gets a lot of snow in the winter (yay canada yay woo yay), I can confirm that it gets very annoying after a while if you live in a city. If you don't.. Have fun :D

Anyways..
- No violence/wars, super bad drug stuff, pollution/global warming stuff, etc. (Exception being to kill animals for food, that's kinda important) - Hearing about murder and issues about discrimination gets annoying after a while, it'd be nice for all of that to go away.
- Sustainability (for our essential resources, such as food) - Canada had a decent cod fishing industry before we decided to be stupid, and other countries have probably run into similar problems.. I'd love for this to be reversed.
- Teleportation powers would be beautiful.. It'd be just for me though, since it's my world >:3
replies.body_tagged:
"Snow forever"

As someone who lives in a country that gets a lot of snow in the winter (yay canada yay woo yay), I can confirm that it gets very annoying after a while if you live in a city. If you don't.. Have fun :D

Anyways..
- No violence/wars, super bad drug stuff, pollution/global warming stuff, etc. (Exception being to kill animals for food, that's kinda important) - Hearing about murder and issues about discrimination gets annoying after a while, it'd be nice for all of that to go away.
- Sustainability (for our essential resources, such as food) - Canada had a decent cod fishing industry before we decided to be stupid, and other countries have probably run into similar problems.. I'd love for this to be reversed.
- Teleportation powers would be beautiful.. It'd be just for me though, since it's my world >:3

replies.body:
1. There is no religion and therefore less wars, violence is gone and the world is at peace.
2. Resources that reproduce as quickly as we use them up, we would never run out of energy.
3. I can fly.

So basically the same as PraecanoVenen's.

Second: No school and parents are not strict and you can do whatever u want

Third: Money is unlimited and any age people can have unlimited money on their credit cards. And you don't have to paid the debts and taxes.
